main_text: Human machine interfaces (HMIs) are essential components that connect people to machines, systems, or devices, enabling control over various functions and access to data. As technology advances, HMIs need to incorporate features like connectivity (via Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, etc.) and LCD screens to support more complex interactions and commands between humans and machines.

This high-performance smart HMI system utilizes a 32-bit MCU, supporting graphical user interface (GUI) creation with an LCD, voice input/output, and IoT connectivity through Wi-Fi, Bluetooth®Low Energy (LE), Ethernet, and more.
benefits: TheRX72N Envision Kitincludes a variety of I/O peripherals, facilitating the development of solutions for diverse applications. The pre-installed demo and emulator circuit enable immediate development for quicker system testing and evaluation.
Rich interfaces support the expansion of system functions and accommodate various development scenarios for a flexible and versatile design.
An audio codec IC with a stereo MEMS microphone supports voice input and output.
Sample code for voice recognition, GUI, LCD, and AWS Cloud and FreeRTOS connectivity facilitates fast system development.

products.title: RX72N - RX Family Flagship 32-bit Microcontroller with Highest Performance
ISL80030 - 3A Synchronous Buck Converter in 2x2 DFN Package
HS3001 - High-Performance Relative Humidity and Temperature Sensor
HS3101 - Relative Humidity and Temperature Sensor with Membrane
ISL97634 - White LED Driver with PWM Dimming
DA7280 - Low Power High-Definition Haptic Driver for Next Generation Human Machine Interfaces
DA16600MOD - Ultra-Low Power Wi-Fi + Bluetooth Low Energy Combo Modules for Battery Powered IoT Devices
AT25SF321B - 32Mbit, 2.7V Minimum SPI Serial Flash Memory with Dual I/O Support
DA7218 - Ultra-Low Power Stereo Codec with Single-Ended Headphone Driver
5X35023 - VersaClock 3S Programmable Clock Generator with Integrated Crystal
READ2304G - High Drivability and High Slew Rate, Input Output Full Range, CMOS Dual Operational Amplifier, VIO ≤±6mV, SR=8V/μs , GBW=6MHz
